outline:
1. to bear, bear a load, drag oneself along
    1. (Qal) to bear (a load)
    2. (Pual) laden (participle)
    3. (Hithpael) to make oneself a burden, drag oneself along
kjv_def: bear, be a burden, carry, strong to labour.
strongs_def: to carry (literally or figuratively), or (reflexively) be burdensome; specifically, to be gravid
